= Introduction =
This google code page contains some addons for [http://www.xpl-perl.org.uk/ xpl-perl] and [http://www.zenah.org.uk/ zenah] projects.

= Details =

  * Violet's Nabaztag xPL client

Look inside the source and enjoy.
